Authentication

Installation

  1. Install opendoas if not already installed:

    # doas || pacman -S --needed opendaos

Configuration

  1. Configure opendoas:
    ## AUTHOR:       AISK11
## LOCATION:     /etc/doas.conf (0600 root:root)
## DEPENDENCIES: community/opendoas
## DESCRIPTION:  System authentication configuration.
 
## Administrative group.
#permit :wheel
permit nopass :wheel
  2. Set config file permissions:

    # chmod 0600 /etc/doas.conf

  3. Replace sudo with doas:

    # ln -sf $(which doas) /usr/bin/sudo

Usage

  1. Add admin user to administrative group:

    # usermod -aG wheel <USER>

    Note: User re-login is required for group changes to take effect.

  2. Execute command as root:

    $ doas <COMMAND>
